snippet: A proposal that would end the legal fight over Rhode Island’s landmark pension overhaul, which has been a model for other states looking to rein in pension costs, was rejected by police union members.
abstract: Proposed settlement that would end legal fight over Rhode Island’s 2011 landmark pension overhaul, which has been a model for other states looking to rein in pension costs, is rejected by police union members.
lead_paragraph: A proposal that would end the legal fight over Rhode Island’s landmark pension overhaul, which has been a model for other states looking to rein in pension costs, was rejected by police union members.

headline.main: Rhode Island: Police Union Derails Public Workers’ Pension Settlement
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: Police Union Derails Public Workers’ Pension Settlement
